knimeNode.name: Word Vector Apply
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies a Word Vector Model to Documents or Strings.

fullDescription.intro: This node applies a Word Vector Model to Documents or Strings, meaning that every word contained in the text will be replaced by the corresponding Word Vector if the word is available in the Word Vector dictionary. This will result in a list of Word Vectors. If specified the node calculates the mean of these vectors resulting in a single representation of the input.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the text where the Word Vector Model should be applied to.
Whether to calculate the mean of the word vectors.

ports.inPort: Table containing Document or String Column.
The Word Vector Model to use for word vector lookup.
ports.outPort: Table with list of word vectors or single mean word vector.
